APICallType.title: APICall
APICallType.description: Serves as a method for characterizing API Calls, as implementations of Malware Actions.

address.description: Specifies the hexadecimal address of the API call in the binary.

return_value.description: Specifies the return value of the API call.

parameters.description: Specifies a list of function parameters, as a dictionary. Each key in the dictionary MUST be a string that captures the exact name of the parameter, and each corresponding key value MUST be a string that captures the corresponding parameter value. For parameter values that can be represented by a constant, e.g., GENERIC_WRITE, the constant value SHOULD be used.

function_name.description: Specifies the exact name of the API function called, e.g. CreateFileEx
